author: pbs.org
title: Indian Summers: Downton Abbey Cast Connection Masterpiece
text: Indian Summers actor Henry Lloyd-Hughes on his surprising connection to Downton Abbey cast member Laura Carmichael (Lady Edith). Indian Summers airs Sundays, September 27 - November 22, 2015 at 9/8c on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #IndianSummersPBS
